trans-unit.resname: CC1·1 | Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +2: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token with "{T}: Add {G}." −2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. −6: Draw a card for each green creature you control. Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end. Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each unspent green mana you have.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·2 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the Roil emerged a ravenous primordial being of pure mana.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·3 | Bane of Progress | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Bane of Progress enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on Bane of Progress for each permanent destroyed this way.

trans-unit.resname: CC1·3 | Bane of Progress | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Urza's forces tore across Argoth, and Argoth responded in kind.
Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
"The land echoes our intentions, and the kami echo the land. We must strive to live in harmony with the world even when it seems to rise against us."\n—Diary of Azusa

At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
"A single chord brings them to heel. A whole song, and they dance."\n—Yisan, the wanderer bard
Deep within the heart of the forest, a new sun flared to life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
"Absolute power is the only true authority. Anything less is a lie told by the weak."\n—Garruk Wildspeaker
